weeklyEmail.teaser: Official email from the UT Austin Chapter of the Society of Physics Students

item.name: Intro to SPS
item.info: Come hear what UT SPS is all about! We'll be talking about what different activities we're planning and would love for the meeting to be as interactive as possible! Unfortunately, we won't have pizza this week but we will next week!

item.name: Physics Careers
item.info: Dr. Franks from the Career Design Center will join us to talk about careers in physics and what resources are available on campus for finding jobs! We'll also unveil a project we'll be working on with the Career Design Center over the course of the semester. If time permits, SPS President, Evan Ott, will present his research from this summer at Sandia National Laboratories.

item.name: Physnic
item.info: This Friday is the Physnic (Physics Department Picnic)! Come to Eastwoods Park just Northeast of RLM at 5pm and get some delicious BBQ! You might even play some Ultimate Frisbee with your professors! It's a great time for the Department of Physics and a great way to meet your fellow physicists!

item.name: Comments or Questions
item.info: Have something to complain about? Or a question? Maybe an idea for a meeting or event? Or suggestions about how we use technology? Contact us at spsofficers@gmail.com or see the links below!
